sentences: Olen lugenud seda raamatut eelmisel aastal.
context: The word 'eelmisel' is the adessive singular form of the Estonian adjective 'eelmine', which means 'previous' or 'last'. It indicates something that happened right before now or in a time period immediately prior to the current one. In Estonian grammar, the adessive case typically expresses location on or at something, but when combined with temporal words like 'hommikul' (morning), 'p채eval' (day), 'n채dalal' (week), 'kuul' (month), 'aastal' (year), it functions to indicate the previous time period.
